Controller

Class ApplicationController

  • java.lang.Object
    • Controller.ApplicationController
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IApplicationController

    public class ApplicationController
extends java.lang.Object
implements IApplicationController
    Controller class for the JabberPoint application.

      • open

        public void open(Presentation presentation)
        Open a presentation who is selected by the user. Only xml files can be opened.
        Specified by:
        open in interface IApplicationController
        Parameters:
        presentation - Will be filled with the new presentation

      • open

        public void open(Presentation presentation,
        java.lang.String fileName)
        Open a new presentation.
        Specified by:
        open in interface IApplicationController
        Parameters:
        presentation - Fill with the new presentation
        fileName - Open this file as the new presentation. If the file name isn't provided then the test presentation is loaded.
